inputs.remark:
缺少 V5 (庆大霉素后随访)。
V3 缺少：Tympanometry: RT 1.20 mL Type A, LT 1.00 mL Type Ad；Acoustic reflexes: 右耳全部缺失，左耳500Hz/1kHz存在(100/105 dB)。
V4 缺少：CDP 与之前相比下降，SOT 5 跌倒，SOT 6 困难，适应性差，重心后移；Rotational Chair: 结果正常。

logic_summary: Added Tympanometry and Acoustic Reflexes to V3 based on remarks and Fig 33.2.
Added CDP and Rotational Chair to V4 based on remarks and text description of November 2012 visit.
Added V5 (post-gentamicin follow-up) with VOG and clinical observations as described in the Outcome section.

value.name: Tympanometry
value.result_summary: RT 1.20 mL Type A, LT 1.00 mL Type Ad.

value.name: Acoustic reflexes
value.result_summary: Right ear absent at all frequencies. Left ear present at 500 Hz (100 dB) and 1 kHz (105 dB).

value.name: Computerized dynamic posturography (CDP)
value.result_summary: Decline compared to previous. Falls on SOT 5, difficulty on SOT 6. Poor effective use of vestibular input. Center of gravity remained backward.

value.collective_interpretation: Follow-up after second gentamicin injection revealed further subjective decline in balance. VOG showed post-headshake nystagmus beating toward the stronger ear and persistent hyperventilation-induced nystagmus.

tests.name: Video-oculography (VOG)
tests.result_summary: 8°/s leftward beating post-headshake nystagmus; 12°/s rightward beating hyperventilation nystagmus. Caloric response: no change in symmetry, decrease in total eye speed.

tests.name: Clinical Observation
tests.result_summary: Reported difficulty in open spaces, climbing bleachers, walking in the dark, and navigating narrow walkways.
